casebody.data:
Ruth CALDERON-CARDONA, et al., petitioners,
v.
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, et al. No. 15-122. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 19, 2016.

Motion of The Levin Judgment Creditors for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.
